values: well, sorry for not writing lately.  I've not been around a computer. Merry Christmas everyone!!!! I can't talk long. just info on my life, Joey and I are still together.  Richard and I are still friends, talking on the phone to him right now.  This christmas kinda sucked.  I got some perfume from Joey, ralph lauren romance,smellls goood!!  And I got a lot of house stuff.fun,fun,fun....well gotta go check my email.

Well, just sittin here at my friend Ashlee's house, yes, it is 6:35 in the morning, we stayed up all night doing like nothing, just talking, playing on the net, stuff like that.  I am so happy, I got my check back from uafs yesterday, $949.20.  its the money left over from my pell grant.  So yay!! Once again the fates have decided to be nice to Jayme and bestow luck upon her.  We can get our apartment early!!!!!!!!  We're going today to look at apartments, hopefully we'll be moved in by Thursday or Friday.  We already have some furniture and stuff that he already had, and his family is getting us stuff for christmas.  excited....
       anyways, toys r us called yesterday. want me to start today, but I need an apartment now. so I start tomorrow.
Just wanted to let everyone know that my new email is browneyedbabiegrrl@yahoo.com.

well, still no word from the suburban queen, maybe monday?
 anywho, I did get a job until something better comes up.  I groveled back on my knees, pleading for my old job back. 
 okay, well in reality, I went in and signed some papers, and got my job back because basically, it's a joke.  Thats right ladies and gents, I am back at WEST!!!!! yuck... But it'll do until someone calls me back, offering something else.  I went to Toys R Us today.  almost as appealling as west, but a tad better.  I don't know yet about school, I guess I'm going to get on the ball about things as they say, and apply for spring semester and get the financial aid stuff going again.  Or maybe fall, who knows???  well, gonna go, I need to do some other stuff.

well, life in good ol Ft. Smith is just peachy so far.  Just like I remembered it.  You honestly wouldn't beleive how much you miss it when you live in another town.  But then you come back, and nothing has changed.  *butwedigress*
   Anyways.  
       I went to staffmark today and the suburbia queen that worked there, (you know the type, all plastic smiles and prerehearsed laughs, the one that was like homecoming queen in her high school in like 95, the one that married her high school sweetheart and is now like all knocked up and has 2 kids and has never lived a life other than F.smith)  
          well, she hired me for a clerical job, but has to check out my references first.  I'll probably be working in a dentist office or something, wearing the cutiepatootie scrubs and sneakers, working my way up the ladder of suburban success, until......tadah!! I am a dental assistant, and I become everything I hate, the women that gossip and chat all day about all their life threatening problems, you know,"How am i ever going to pick up andrew by 3:30, take him to soccer practice, get groceries, take sarah to girl scouts, pick up the drycleaning and make it to the bank by 5:00?"  ahhhhhhhhh, the joys of my future....
     well, anyways, still waiting to hear from my old buddies, where ya at????
hinthinthint.... gotta go, going to get some grub..

Okay, well today I went back to Tulsa for the rest of my stuff, my  mom wasn't home so much drama was avoided.  Tommorrow, job searching!!!  Anyways, I don't really feel like writing much, just got home from tulsa and I'm tired.
much love, jayme
What Inuyasha Character are you?

Hey anyone who still writes and views livejournal!! To all my friends, I miss you all soo much since graduation.  My life has changed so muchesmuches and I have much to write about.  I moved to Tulsa to live with my mom and as of 7:00 this morning, no longer do.  I went to school at Tulsa until now.  My mother and I got in a huge fight and I came back to Ft. Smith.  Richard and I broke up,  sob, sob,  in like August.  I got together with this hottie named Joey from Cali. and I live with him now in Van Buren, I guess I'll enroll in UoA fs and start winter semester.  rich and I still talk but no longer pretend to be the happy couple we thought we were.  anyways, everyone that still participates in the community of fs or northside, my old comrades, please post and let me know how you are, miss you all muches...
            Jayme

The Boob Poem 
For years and years they told me, 
Be careful of your breasts. 
Don't ever squeeze or bruise them. 
And give them monthly tests. 
So I heeded all their warnings, 
And protected them by law. 
Guarded them very carefully, 
And I always wore my bra. 
After 30 years of astute care, 
My gyno, Dr. Pruitt, 
Said I should get a Mammogram. 
"O.K," I said, "let's do it." 
"Stand up here real close" she said, 
(She got my boob in line), 
"And tell me when it hurts," she said, 
"Ah yes! Right there, that's fine." 
She stepped upon a pedal, 
I could not believe my eyes! 
A plastic plate came slamming down, 
My hooter's in a vise! 
My skin was stretched and mangled, 
From underneath my chin. 
My poor boob was being squashed, 
To Swedish Pancake thin. 
Excruciating pain I felt, 
Within it's vise-like grip. 
A prisoner in this vicious thing, 
My poor defenseless tit! 
"Take a deep breath" she said to me, 
Who does she think she's kidding?!? 
My chest is mashed in her machine, 
And woozy I am getting. 
"There, that's good," I heard her say, 
(The room was slowly swaying.) 
"Now, let's have a go at the other one." 
Have mercy, I was praying. 
It squeezed me from both up and down, 
It squeezed me from both sides. 
I'll bet SHE'S never had this done, 
To HER tender little hide. 
Next time that they make me do this, 
I will request a blindfold. 
I have no wish to see again, 
My knockers getting steamrolled. 
If I had no problem when I came in, 
I surely have one now. 
If there had been a cyst in there, 
It would have gone "ker-pow!" 
This machine was created by a man, 
Of this, I have no doubt. 
I'd like to stick his balls in there, 
And see how THEY come out.

well, got back from San Antonio on Sunday.  sooo sleepy!!  Didn't get much sleep on the bus ride home, fell asleep somehow for about 45 minutes and then when I woke up, my pillow was switched with A.J.'s and Ben was switched with A.J. somehow... so then mr. Cromer had gone mad and decided to go to Denny's at 4:00 in the morning, so me and Tasha stayed on the bus and slept.  San Antonio was fun, but I missed Richard so much.  Got some random hot guy telling me I was hot!  Kinda weird, then Ashley and Sarah decided to take it upon themselves to get his phone number, ahhh!! crazy, I won't call him, I love Richard, but makes me feel kinda good.  anyways.  last week of school.  kinda getting to me.  I don't know.  I don't even think I'm going to wear mascara next Thursday.  excited about prom though, yay, I get to be pretty for a night, kinda like playing dress up every once in a while. anyways, I'm gonna go, I got stuff to do in the library.
You have a lot of mood swings. One day you're almond, the next you're crunchy. Make up your mind! People can always find you, since you're just that cool. Or not.

I am soo tired...  I swear, I bet if I could go to sleep before 3:30 every night I wouldn't be so tired.... anyways.  partying tonight. It's friend's night thank god... anyways, I don't feel like writing so I'll check in on Monday.

well, I start my new job today.  Yay!!! I go in at 5:00. (T.J. Maxx)  I am already ready to get off work.  I'm kinda nervous.  I usually get nervous everytime I get a new job because I have to learn new things and meet new people, fun,fun,fun... anyways, gotta go...

Today was another boring day.  22 more days left everyone!! Not counting weekends and such.  I am soo sick Cromer's choices for our spring concert.  We perform concert music all year, even follies songs were stuffy and his choices.  I think we should do songs that people know.  Like anything besides the Jesus songs. Now, I am not an atheist, but every song we sing is about Jesus.  Or a saint.  We're in public school, if I wanted to sing about god, its called church, or Van Buren Christian.  City called Heaven, I hate to say, is going to suck ass.  Huge, cellulite ridden ass.  The choir part is the same note over and over and most of the soloists just don't work with that song.  They may sing well normally, but on an african gospel song, no, I think not.  You need some soul to belt that out and sound acceptable.  Anyways.  gonna go, got some work to do.

perfect. Now everyone understands why I hate high school people. this explains it!
Take the What High School Stereotype Are You? quiz, by Angel.

Oh my god!! Yes!! I love unicorns, this proves that I am not crazy, I am a unicorn reincarnated. hahaha. take that.

You are the most universal mythical beast ever. Sightings of the unicorn have been reported from all over the world, even in these modern times. Unicorns are pure and incurruptible. In China, unicorns symbolised gentleness, good will, and wisdom. Christianity links the unicorn with Christ. It is said that unicorns would only allow virgin girls to see them, let alone touch them. They were easily lured into fatal ambushes by a virgin with some potchers waiting for the unicorn in nearby bushes. A unicorn's horn was a highly prised possesion, which was reputed to have great healing capabilities. With the touch of its horn, a unicorn could bring back a person who had been dead for several hours. But when disattached from the unicorn's body, the magic was suggnificantly reduced and could only protect against poison. The unicorn had the body of a horse, a unique spirling horn, and a lion's tail. They were pure white in color. Congragulations, you are a rarity amoung mythical beasts. There aren't enough of people like you in the world.
What mythical beast best represents you? Take the quiz!

well, just sitting here in the library, almost done with another pathetic day of high school.  god 49 days.  thank you, thank you, thank you oh god of the institution of learning.  I got called in the office the other day.  They gave me this shit about how I can only miss 2 more days of school, yada, yada, yada, your 18, yada, yada, yada, if you miss more than 2 days then you don't graduate, yada, yada, yada, and so on.  god, you would think if they were all excused it wouldn't matter, but we digress......
anyways.  state festival's this Saturday.  I have to be here at like 8:00 in the freakin morning, so everyone be prepared to see pj's and bedhead.  and a major bitch.  mornings are not my time, especially on days that I'm supposed to be allowed to sleep in.... sacrifices we have to make just to get that damn diploma.  well, maybe we'll find a starbucks like we did last time. yum...gonna go, gotta type my research paper.

Okay, did anyone see the episode of the simpsons the other night?  Sunday?  Homer messed up his eyes, some crows attacked him and they messed up his eyes, well, the doctor prescribed him medicinal marijuana and Homer started smoking pot!!! Oh my god, so here we are watching this show with Richard's 12 year old brother Thomas.  I swear, drugs are everywhere, so anyways, Homer became like this huge pothead and stuff.  
 
Another drug occurence in the child's media.  Alice in Wonderland.  Great movie right?  Right.  Drugs.  everywhere.  I'm sitting there watching this movie the other night at my mom's house, ( I am a Disney child) and I start noticing things I did not notice when I was 6.  Alice drinks this stuff at the beginning kind of, after she falls down the rabbit hole, that makes her shrink, then get bigger, and so on.  Yeah, Alice is drunk!! 
Then at Rabbits house, she eats some candy or something and she shrinks, then gets bigger.  Her legs stick out of rabbits house.  She's drugged on something.  Then she meets the chesire cat, a messed up feline with a smile bigger than Julia Roberts and he talks to her and dissapears.  She's tripping.  Hallucinogins.  She then meets a caterpillar sitting on top of a mushroom smoking a bong.  AAhhh!!!  "And who are YOU?"  he asks.  he's high.  then at the caterpillars peer pressure, she eats shrooms.  gets really big and then really small.  she's tripping on shrooms.  does anyone not see this?  there are drugs all over the children's cartoons!! Smurfs? Yeah.  I think so too.  Also, watch willy wonka and the chocolate factory.  I think there was stuff other than sugar and artifical colors in Mr. Wonkas scrumdidilyumptious bars....

Oh Jew, oh Jew, do you hate him
Cause he's pieces of you?

 Tomorrow it'll be 12 years that my dad died.  When I was little, my dad used to sing this song to me when I went to sleep.  He could play the guitar and sing really well.  This will always be  my favorite song in the whole world.  
   I love you daddy.

Okay I'm just sittin in here in the library ( t.a. in 7th period) and thought I'd update my journal.  Ben said something today in choir that made me laugh my ass off.  something about having sex inside a blue whale.  kinda gross, but hey, I thought it was funny.  You had to be there I guess. 
 anyways.  I'm going up to uafs tomorrow to fill out all my stuff.  funfunfun...  well, the bells gonna ring in like 5 so I'm gonna go.

well today was going okay until 6th period.  I'm sitting there and hoping that Mrs. Dewitt doesn't draw my name and guess what?  She does, the first name she called was mine.  It wouldn't be so bad except that the speech was on us.  Our personal life story.  Mine is not a brady bunch tale, the hardest thing I've ever had to accomplish is far beyond making an A on a chem test or making cheerleading, my life is a constant downer.  Like the past you know, and I think that I shouldn't have to tell complete strangers about my life.  I shouldn't have to explain myself or justify foster care.  I hate telling people that I'm in foster care you know.  Especially people that I don't know.  Their response is either two things, either they pity you and feel sorry for you because your life hasn't been peachy keen, or they criticize you.  I feel like when people find out what has happened in my past, they are constantly analyzing me and what could be wrong with me.  I just want to scream " I didn't do anything wrong, my parents fucked up, not me. I survived and didn't turn out too messed up.  I didn't drop out of school in the 10th grade, haven't turned into a major druggie, never been in a mental hospital (unlike most foster children) and I maintain a healthy- I guess you could call it that- relationship with my mother. So get over it and treat me like a normal human being!!!!!!!!!!!!"  Sorry, just had to get that out.  Anyways, I'm gonna go for now.

Hey hey everyone!! I haven't wrote in a while, been a little busy.  I got all the senior dates today.  :( I can't beleive that we graduate in like 3 months.  It's freaky!!!  I'll post them so everyone can write them down.  

 1) payments on graduation orders- march 1
 2) graduation supply orders delivered- April 4 and April 9
 3) banquet tickets- April 23- May 6th-$15.00
 4) prom tickets- may 7-22  $10.00 senior  $15.00- guest
 5) senior group picture, in cap and gown!!, April 17th, 8:15
 6) baccalaureate- May 19, 2:30 First United Methodist Church, be there at 2:00!
 7) Senior banquet- May 10- ( seniors only!!) Holiday Inn Civic Center Ballroom- they don't have a date on the sheet, but Mrs. Brown says this is probably 6:30.
 8) Senior Prom- May 25 Holiday Inn Civic Center Ballroom(after prom activities begin at midnight)
 9) Graduatio Practice Thursday, May 30 at 9:00 a.m. in the stadium. Class of 2002 commencement exercises begin at 7:30 p.m.

Well, today is Friday.  I haven't gone to school in like a week, well except that 1/2 day I went on Wednesday.  I don't like missing school, its just my back hurts a lot and I can't take the pain medicine the doctor gave me at school because I can't even walk when I'm on it.  (They're narcotics)  They make me so drowsy, I sleep all day.  I was going to go to school today but the doctor told me not to return to school until monday, so ms. pat won't let me go back to school until monday.  You know what I realized?  I missed the last spirit week at school. That we graduate in 3 months.  It's weird to think of that.  Well, anyways, I'm gonna go for now, I'm kind of tired.

I have come to the final realization that I truly love Rich.  With every thing in my body.  I know it's mush mush for a lot of you, but I have felt a lot of hesitation lately.  I know why now.  I was scared of loving someone that much.  With every bone in my body.  With every inch of my soul and mind and spirit.  He makes me so happy and he treats me as if I am the best thing in his life.  I don't think I have ever been loved so much by anyone in my life.  Maybe my dad.  Maybe my mom.  But never with this much intensity.  He takes care of me.  He respects me.  He knows me.  I love him.


I've run from these feelings for so long
Telling my heart I didn't mean it
Pretending that I was better off alone
But I know that it's just a lie
So afraid of taking a chance again
So afraid of what I'd feel inside

But I need to be next to you
I need to share every breath with you
I need to know I can see you smiling each morning
Look into your eyes each night
For the rest of my life

Here with you, Near with you
Oh I
I need to be next to you

I'd lose my mind if I could see you
Without you there is nothing in this life
That would make life worth living for
I can't bear the thought of you not there
I can't fight what I feel anymore

I need to know I can see you smiling each morning

For the rest of my life

I need to be next to you
Need to be need to be next to you
Share every breath with you
I need to feel you in my arms babe
In my arms, babe
I need to be next to you
